availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles L. Hertel (Greenup County, Kentucky, clerk)

body.p: Greenup County, Kentucky, clerk. Kentucky native. Son of Joanna E. Hertel. Student in Greenup County, Kentucky, in 1850. Clerk in Greenup County in 1860. Clerk in Greenup County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, District 2 p. 158B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, Subdistrict 2 East Little Sandy, p. 837.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War) NARA RG 110, Greenup County, KY, September 1863, p. 157.
"Charles Lewis Hertel (1838-1914)," Find A Grave, Memorial #90235335, accessed January 10, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/90235335.
